items.description: Build a history contribution grid component using canvas, which can be passed an array of dates and quantities of contributions, and display colors with intensity depending on relative contribution frequency. The component should also receive a start and end date, and display the proper amount of squares (days)
items.title: History grid

items.description: When a story is dragged in progress, set its initial time. When it is dragged into done, set its completion time, and save the time difference to display it in hours.
